entry.title: Handheld Steamer For Clothes
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ushoperra
Type:
Price: 54.99

Finally, remove wrinkles from your clothes in minutes!

Gone are the days of taking out the ironing board, pulling out the iron, waiting for it to heat up, and spending a lot of time removing wrinkles from clothes. The revolutionary Portable Fabric Steamer is the amazing new portable wrinkle remover.

It is safe, compact, easy to use and ideal for home and travel. Just fill it with water, let it heat, and get perfect wrinkle-free clothes in just minutes!

Features:

  • Connecting the power supply, it can produce continuous, high temperature and high pressure steam in two minutes. It is very suitable for household cleaning and ironing clothes.
  • Ironing: high-temperature strong steam can easily ironing clothes, curtains, sheets, pillowcases, etc., in particular, the need for vertical ironing clothes (such as suits, etc.), more suitable for ironing with this product, the product is equipped with an ironing brush, in addition to ironing, but also sterilization of clothes and removal of odors. 
  • Sterilization: high temperature and strong steam can kill a variety of harmful bacteria quickly and ensure the cleanliness of household.
  • Cleaning: High temperature and strong steam can easily dissolve and strip the oil stains, dirt and mold spots on the surface and cracks of household products. The product is also equipped with brush, window brush head, in the ejection of high-temperature steam at the same time, can scrub the surface of objects, clean simple and quick, the effect is remarkable.
  • Water tank separation: easy dismantling and water adding, is a reduced version of vertical hanging steamer machine, which is very popular in the market.

Specifications:

  • Voltage: 100V-220V
  • Product power: 1200W
  • Water tank capacity: 140ml
  • Heating mode: Electric heating type.
  • Scope of use: ironing of clothes, shirts, underwear, bags, neckties, etc.
  • Product functions: ironing, humidifying, disinfecting and sterilizing
  • Product weight: 880g

Included:

1* Handheld Fabric Steamer + accessories

entry.title: Hanging Shower Caddy
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ushoperra
Type:
Price: 79.99

Features:

  • STORAGE MADE SIMPLE: Keep shower essentials such as bar soap, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, and body scrub close at hand with this convenient shower and bathtub caddy; This caddy features two wide shelf baskets, two smaller swivel baskets, 3 towel hooks, and a washcloth bar; The open grid design allows for maximum drainage and air circulation, items dry quickly, reducing the risk of mold and mildew; Use over shower stall/bathtub doors or interior bathroom doors.
  • 3 TIER STORAGE: This organizer has space to store a wide variety of products in multiple shapes and sizes; A built in bar holds washcloths; The large baskets store shampoo, conditioner, body wash, hand soap, razors, shaving cream, oils, facial cleansers, leave-in conditioners and salt scrubs; The center baskets swivel to make room for larger bottles in the bottom basket.
  • EASY INSTALLATION: Simply hang over the shower door, and it is ready to use; No hardware or drilling needed, just slide the top hooks our and it is ready to hang; Fits over standard shower and interior doors; Two suction cups keep the caddy secure on smooth glass shower doors.
  • QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Made from sturdy steel wire with a durable rust-resistant finish; Plastic suction cups; Suction cups adhere best to clean smooth, non-porous surfaces; Designed for use in moisture-rich bathroom environments; Easy Care - wipe clean with a damp cloth.

Specifications

  • Product Dimension (in) : 20.1 " L x 5.1 " W x 26 " H
  • Product Weight (lbs) : 4.4
  • Box Dimension (in) : 12.8 " L x 5.5 " W x 28 " H
  • Box Weight (lbs) : 6.0

Packages:

  1. Hanging Shower Caddy.

entry.title: 5 in 1 Desk Organizer Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ushoperra
Type:
Price: 39.99

Description

Is clutter causing chaos on your desktop? Set up your desk for success with the help of this five-piece desktop organizer set. Each piece is crafted from metal and showcases a solid finish that can easily blend in with nearly any colour palette. Keep your writing utensils corralled with the help of the pencil cup holder, and organize your memos and more with the included letter sorter, letter tray, hanging file organizer, and sticky note holder.

FEATURES

  • Piece includes: 1 pencil cup holder, 1 letter sorter, 1 letter tray, 1 hanging file organizer, and 1 sticky note holder
  • Enhances your workstation and great for a desk, counter, or dresser. Fits small spaces like studios, cubicles, shelves, drawers, etc. Can be used for anything: file tray stand, desk folder organizer tray, letter sorter desktop, book collection organizer, folder holder, and more.
  • Modern sleek aesthetic fits most decor, made of durable metal with a beautiful finish, round edging along bottom and top rim prevents scratches, fashionable gift for busy organized professionals

Specifications

  • Product Type: Desk Organizer Set
  • Material: Metal
  • Colour: Black, Copper, Silver, White.

Dimensions

  • Hanging File Organizer : 9.25'' H x 13'' W x 5.5'' D
  • Letter Tray : 2.25'' H x 12'' W x 9.75'' D
  • Letter Sorter Divider : 3.7'' H x 7.5'' W x 3.5'' D
  • Pencil Cup Holder : 4'' H x 3.5'' W x 12.5'' D
  • Weight : 1.22kg

entry.title: Bath Towel Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ushoperra
Type:
Price: 74.00

Thanks to the unique waffle weave of the Onsen towels in this bath towel set, it’s seriously lightweight—you can even see through the airy weave if you hold it up to the light—but it absorbs water better than even the plushest terry bath towels out there. The super strong supima cotton gives the towel a resilience that means it’ll do its job just as well on day one as it will the last day of its life. And thanks to it’s open weave, it dries out quickly after you use it, so you’ll never reach for a wet, musty towel after a shower ever again.

  • Woven from the softest, smoothest cotton on Earth to make sure it feels great when you use it
  • Thirsty waffle weave soaks up water fast and dries itself out quick when you’re done
  • Made from 100% American-grown supima cotton
  • The strength of extra long cotton fibers create a longer lasting fabric that does its job well for the life of the towel
  • Gets better over time as the waffle weave gets deeper and thirstier with use
  • Lightweight and storage friendly—about 30% lighter and 50% less bulky versus average terry towels
  • Garment washing makes the towels even softer and gives it the signature 3D texture of the weave
  • Compressible weave and lightweight build make it a great option for travel when you want to bring your own towel

 


SIZE CHART :

630 g

470 g
